Charity heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 800 in order to purchase fish to offer for sale.

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty lives, age 30, runs a food stall business to earn a living. She and her husband have four children. The family lives in Yei. She has been in her business for three years. Three of her children are enrolled in school. 

Betty heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 1000 in order to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale. 

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale

loans.name: Melva

texts.es: Melva, de 37 años, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive desde hace 18 años junto a Olmes, su esposo. Ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Lorenzo. Todas las mañanas se dedica al cuidado de sus vacas, pues desde muy temprano las saca a los campos naturales para que se alimenten de pastos sanos y nutritivos. Gracias a sus cuidados, vende la leche que produce sus vacas a los comerciantes, para que realicen productos lácteos. Cuenta que al día vende de 22 a 25 litros de leche fresca. Pero como gusta de cuidar animales, además de brindarle buenos ingresos, también tiene ovejas, cerdos, cuyes y conejos, los cuales comercializa en carne a la feria que se desarrolla en Jauja, pero si tiene suerte los mismos compradores visitan su casa. Pues ella es muy conocida, ya que siembra productos agrícolas como papa, alverja y maíz, los cuales vende en su misma chacra y en épocas de cosecha, ya que es una mujer muy trabajadora. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Fuerza san lorenzo” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Melva de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 parcelas de alfalfa para el alimento de sus animales.
texts.en:
Melva, 37 years old, is a working woman. She has been living with her husband, Olmes, for 18 years. They have 3 children who they care for in their own home, located in San Lorenzo. 

Every morning she cares for her cows; very early she takes them to pasture to feed them naturally and nutritiously. Thanks to her care, she sells the milk the cows produce to merchants, in order sell dairy products. She sells about 22 to 25 liters of fresh milk daily. 

But she likes caring for animals, and it brings in good income. She also has sheep, pigs, guinea pigs and rabbits, which she sells as meat at the Jauja market, but when she is lucky her buyers come to her house to buy the meat. 

She is very well known, growing agricultural crops such as potatoes, peas and corn, which she sells at the same farm during harvest times, as she is a very hard working woman. 

She belongs to the solidarity group “Fuerza San Lorenzo” and this is her first loan with MFP. She feels happy, obtaining the necessary capital to improve her business and therefore her quality of life. She also likes belonging to her association, because the members are united working women. 

Melva, upon receiving your help, will invest the requested money from the loan in the purchase of two parcels of alfalfa to feed to her animals.

loans.use: to buy two parcels of alfalfa

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: Angélica, de  46 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Ramulfo, su esposo. Ambos tienen 2 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia. Ella es una mujer independiente, estudió educación primaria y se desempeña como docente en una escuela de la ciudad. Es muy conocida y querida entre sus colegas y los alumnos. Este desarrollo lo obtuvo gracias a su esposo, quien también es docente y le inculcó el progreso y desarrollo. Por ello como buena madre de familia, espera que sus hijos sigan sus pasos y se convierten en profesionales. Hace algún tiempo sufrió un pequeño problema, cuenta que casi pierde su casa, por lo que ahora aprendió que tiene que registrar en el estado con los papeles que legalmente le amparan como propietaria, por ello ya comenzó a registrarse y muy pronto será dueña de la misma legalmente. Ella pertenece a un grupo solidario y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Angélica de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago de los papeles para registrar su casa, como propia.
texts.en:
Angélica, 46, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with her husband Ramulfo.  They have two children for whom they care in their own house.  She is an independent woman.  She studied elementary education and works as a teacher in a school in the city.  She is very well known and loved among her colleagues and the students.  She received this growth thanks to her husband, who also is a teacher and instilled in her progress and development.  As a good mother, she hopes that her children follow in her footsteps and become professionals.

Some time ago she had a small problem.  She says she lost her house.  She learned now that she has to register it with the state with the papers that legally protect her as the owner.  For this reason she already began to register herself, and very soon she will be the legal owner of the house.

She belongs to a solidarity group and this is her fourth loan with MFP, where she feels very satisfied for being able to carry out her activities without incident because she has the help of all of you.  In addition, she promises to make her payments punctually because she always was a hardworking and honorable person.

When she receives her support, Angélica will invest the requested money in paying for the paperwork to register her house as her own.

loans.use: to do the formalities to buy her house.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.es:
Teófila, de 33 años, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Antonio, su esposo desde hace 9 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Edwin, John y Eddy, juntos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Chacchacancha. Cada cosecha tiene que fertilizar sus cultivos por lo menos 4 veces, por eso siempre está atento a las fechas. Gusta mucho de la agricultura, su principal actividad económica. Todas las mañanas desde muy temprano junto a su esposo cuidan de sus cultivos entre: papa, olluco y maíz, los que en cada cosecha comercializan a la ciudad de Huancayo, o en sus mismos terrenos agrícolas, cuenta que su esposo en temporadas de demanda de alimentos, viaja él mismo para comercializar las cosechas integras. Al mismo tiempo, Teofila cuida de sus 8 cerdos, los cuales vende ensebándolos a la feria que se realiza en su localidad, además su esposo trabaja como cargador de costales de alimentos hacia los camiones, donde recibe un ingreso adicional. Ahora se encuentran viviendo en la ciudad, en una casa alquilada, pues sus hijos estudian en la ciudad, pero confiesan que siempre viajan a su pueblo, donde realizan sus actividades. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Teófila de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de herramientas, para limpiar sus sembríos, levantar los surcos, alinear los sembríos y quitar la maleza.
texts.en:
Teófila is a 33 year old hard-working woman. She lives with Antonio, her husband of 9 years. They have 3 children: Edwin, John, and Eddy, and together they live in their own house located in the town of Chacchacancha. 

For each harvest Teófila has to fertilize her crops at least 4 times, and because of this she is always aware of the dates. She enjoys agriculture very much and it is her primary means of income. Every morning beginning very early she and her husband take care of their crops, including potatoes, ulluco root, and corn. During every harvest they sell these crops in the city of Huancayo or in their own agricultural land. Teófila explains that during the high demand season for food, her husband himself travels to sell the integral crops. 

At the same time, Teófila takes care of her 8 pigs, which she fattens and sells in her local town's market. In addition, her husband works transporting bags of food to the trucks, from which he receives additional income. Currently Teófila and her husband are living in a rented house in the city since their children study in the city, but they confess that they always travel to their town where they do their activities. 

This is her third loan with MFP and Teófila is happy because she has the capital necessary to improve her business and thus her quality of life. Additionally, she likes belonging to the association because its members are caring and hard-working. Upon receiving this support, Teófila will invest the requested money in the purchase of tools to clear her fields, raise the rows, align the crops, and remove weeds.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural tools.

loans.name: Cicilia

texts.en:
Cicilia, age 30, is a fish vendor. She has been engaged in this work for four years. She lives with her husband and three children in Yei. All three children are enrolled in school. 

Cicilia heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 1000 in order to purchase fish to offer for sale.

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish to offer for sale

loans.name: Nina

texts.en:
Nina, age 60, is a farmer living in Dashtadem village. She lives with with 63-year-old husband, her 31-year-old daughter, her 31-year-old daughter-in-law, and her small grandchildren. 

Nina's husband and son are both employed in construction as well as helping to run the family farm, where they cultivate land and breed pigs. Nina has applied for this loan to start land cultivation. In particular, she plans to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer. 

Nina hopes to gather a rich harvest this year, which will allow her not only to support her family, but also to sell more, thus attaining additional income to further develop her farm.

loans.use: to purchase potato seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Gevorg

texts.en:
Gevorg is a 29-year-old entrepreneur from Yerevan. He lives with his wife, a nurse, pensioner parents, and student sister.

Gevorg trades with equipment for cars. He started this business in 2006 and has successfully run it and expanded the inventory variety. To meet his clients demands, Gevorg needs to add new types of equipment. Thus, Gevorg has applied for this loan to purchase the necessary equipment. This will help Gevorg to increase sales and get additional income, which is vital for Gevorg and his family to make ends meet.

loans.use: to pay for equipment for cars.

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is a 44-year-old livestock keeper in Mariakani. She is married. Lucy has been selling livestock and livestock products for the last 17 years and she is doing great.

This is Lucy’s third loan from KADET LTD. She plans to purchase more goats, cows, and poultry. She will use the anticipated profits to start a water selling business and repay her loan. She hopes to excel in the business.

loans.use: to purchase more goats, cows, and poultry.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther, age 42, operates a general merchandise business in Kimana. She has been in this business for 12 years now and earns a monthly income of 17,000 shillings. She and her husband have three children.

This will be Esther’s first loan with KADET Ltd. She plans use the entire loan to purchase a stock of jugs, thermoses, and basins to offer for sale. 

With the profit generated from this loan, she intends to expand the business.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of jugs, thermoses, and basins to offer for sale

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose, age 30, runs a food stall business. She has been engaged in this business for four years. She lives in Yei with her husband and four children. All the children are enrolled in school.

Rose heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer, and this is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan in the amount of 500 in order to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale. 

She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes and onions to offer for sale

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
Betty, de 23 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive desde hace 2 años con José, su esposo. Ambos tienen un hijo: Jean Franco, al que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Hualahoyo. Cada 15 días su esposo, regresa a casa. Ella se siente muy feliz, pues sabe que le ayudará en el negocio de ladrillos, sobre todo porque tiene mucho conocimiento de las nuevas tendencias en la fabricación, ya que trabaja en una reconocida fábrica a nivel nacional, de ladrillos. Al día realiza 500 ladrillos con la ayuda de un personal, al mes un promedio de 4 millares, los que vende a los proveedores que llegan a su misma fábrica. Todavía no tiene un negocio grande, “cuando mi esposo adquiera los conocimientos necesario, podré emprender una fábrica reconocida”, afirma con mucho optimismo. Paralelo a este trabajo, Betty, tiene una tienda de comestibles, donde vende productos de primera necesidad, posee todo lo necesario para poder atender a sus clientes y saciar todas sus necesidades. Por ahora ella, se centra en el desarrollo de este negocio sin descuidar lo que ya posee. Este es el sexto crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Betty de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de mercadería y productos de primera necesidad para su tienda.
texts.en:
Betty is a hardworking, 23-year-old woman. For 2 years, she has lived with her husband José. They have a son Jean Franco, whom they care for in their home in Hualahoyo. Her husband returns home every two weeks. She is happy with this because she knows it will help his brick-making business. He is learning much about new manufacturing techniques because he works in a national brick manufacturing plant. He makes 500 bricks a day with the help of another worker and an average of 4000 bricks a month, which he sells to suppliers who come to his own small factory. 'When my husband acquires the necessary skills, he will be able to establish a reputable plant,” she declares optimistically. 

Along with this business, Betty has a grocery story where she sells consumer staples. She stocks all that is required to service her customers and satisfy their needs. For now she is concentrating on developing this business, without neglecting what she already has. This is her 6th loan cycle with MFP. She is happy to have the capital necessary to grow her business and improve her quality of life. She also enjoys belonging to her association because the members are caring and hardworking people. Betty will use the loan she is requesting to buy merchandise and consumer staples for her store.

loans.use: to buy consumer staples for her store.

loans.name: Rufo

texts.es:
Rufo, de 40 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive desde hace 18 años en compañía de Yessi, su esposa. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Juan y Renzo a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Chilca.
Junto a su esposa desde hace 4 años atrás, comenzó en el negocio de trasporte público, posee 4 autos, los cuales alquila a chóferes, por una suma considerable de dinero al día. Esto le permite, adquirir un ingreso estable, pero le preocupa el cuidado de sus vehículos, pues afirma que muchas veces los conductores irresponsables chocan sus autos y no responden por ello, “Es esa situación tengo que asumir los gastos, yo mismo”, comenta. La ruta en la que trabaja en céntrica de la plaza central a los registros públicos, su esposa controla la llegada de los autos que tiene la línea, de esa manera hace un buen equipo para su negocio. Pero como posee un licencia de conducir camiones, trabaja como chofer para trasportar carga pesada por todo el país, cuenta que dentro de poco viajará a Moya, para trasladar trigo, ahí le pagan muy bien pues el traslado de alimentos exige de mucha responsabilidad. Este es crédito número diecinueve con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Rufo de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago de refacción de su vehículo que fue chocado.
texts.en:
Rufo, 40, is a hardworking man.  He has lived with his wife Yessi for 18 years.  Together they have two children: Juan and Renzo, whom they care for in their own home, located in the town of Chilca. 

Four years ago, along with his wife, Rufo started a public transportation business.  He has 4 automobiles that he rents to drivers for a considerable sum of money per day.  This has allowed him to have a stable income.  However, he is concerned about the care of his vehicles, because he says that many times the irresponsible drivers crash the cars and are not liable for it. "In this type of situation, it is I who has to pay for the expenses," he says.  The route that he works runs from the central plaza to the office of public records.  His wife monitors the arrival of the cars that they have in their fleet, and in this way they make a good team for their business.  However, since he has a license to drive trucks, he works as a driver transporting heavy cargo throughout the country.  He says that soon he will travel to Moya to transport wheat, where they pay him very well, as the transportation of food products requires a lot of responsibility.  This is his 19th loan with MFP, and he feels happy, because he has the capital he needs to improve his business, and therefore his quality of life.  In addition, he enjoys being a member of his communal bank, because the members are hardworking and supportive people.  Upon receiving your support, Rufo will use this loan to pay for repairs to his vehicle, which was in a collision.

loans.use: to take his vehicle to an auto body shop to get it repaired

loans.name: Yeny

texts.es: Yeny, de 25 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive desde hace 5 años, junto a Enrique, su esposo. Ambos tienen una hija: Lesly, a la que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Huertas. Desde hace 4 años, despierta todas las mañanas en busca de paja y ramas secas, pues tiene que hornear las tejas y ladrillos que prepara. Gusta mucho de su trabajo, sobre todo por que junto a su esposo, afrontan los problemas de su negocio y también disfrutan de los aciertos. Al día realiza un promedio de 400 a 600 unidades de ladrillos. Eso le gusta mucho sobre todo porque, puede tener más de una hornada al mes, quiere decir 12 millares. Pero confiesa, muy ofuscada; que la temporada donde tiene menos ingresos es en invierno, ya que las lluvias impiden que seque los ladrillos, su producción se reduce a la mitad. Es entonces que ella aprovecha esa oportunidad para poder sembrar en su terreno agrícola, según cuenta sus sembríos constan de maíz, alverja y poco de papa, los que en cada cosecha, comercializa a la ciudad de Jauja, donde se realiza las ferias dominicales. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Yeny de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de los ladrillos y tejas.
texts.en:
Yeny is a 25 year old hard-working woman. She has lived for 5 years with her husband Enrique. Together they have a daughter, Lesly, whom they care for in their own house located in the town of Huertas. 

Beginning 4 years ago, Yeny wakes up every morning in search of straw and dry sticks because she has to bake the tiles and bricks that she prepares. She enjoys her job very much, above all because together with her husband they face their business problems and also enjoy the successes. 

Yeny makes a daily average of 400 to 600 bricks. She likes this a lot because she can have more than one batch per month, which means 12 thousand bricks. But she confesses, very confused, that the season during which she has the least income is winter, when the rains impede the drying of the bricks and her production reduces to half. It is during this time that Yeny takes advantage of the opportunity to seed her agricultural land, which consists of corn, peas, and some potatoes. In each harvest, she sells these crops in the city of Jauja, where there are Sunday markets. 

This is Yeny's first loan with MFP, and she is happy because she has the capital necessary to improve her business and thus her quality of life. In addition, she likes belonging to the association because its members are caring and hard-working. Upon receiving this support, Yeny will invest the requested money in the purchase of raw materials for making bricks and tiles.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials for making bricks and tiles.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es: Angélica, de 32 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Hugo, su esposo desde hace 14 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Pampas. Ella trabaja en la escuela más reconocida de su localidad, es una mujer muy trabajadora, sobre todo porque, vive en la misma institución, en donde cuida las instalaciones, ya tiene 8 años dedicándose a esta labor, y ya todos la conocen sobre todo porque es una mujer muy inteligente y siempre busca maneras novedosas de vender sus alimentos. Pero como no le gusta descansar, también sale todos los fines de semana a la feria de su ciudad, donde vende productos de temporada como juguetes y en épocas escolares, libros, cuadernos, lapiceros y demás útiles de escritorio. Ahora ella desea instalar un pequeño restaurante en su negocio, le falta muy poco, ya comenzó comprando algunos instrumentos como platos, cucharas y demás. Ella pertenece aún grupo solidario y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Angélica de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos alimenticios para su tienda.
texts.en: Angélica, 32, is a hardworking woman who lives with Hugo, her husband of 14 years.  Together they have 4 children that they care for in their own home, located in the town of Pampas.  Angélica works in the most well-known school in her area.  She is a hardworking woman, most of all because she lives on the grounds of the school, where she also serves as a caretaker.  She has been doing this work for 8 years, and now everyone knows her and knows her to be a very intelligent woman who is always seeking new ways to sell her food.  However, since she doesn't like to rest, she also goes out on the weekends to the market in her city where she sells seasonal products such as toys and, during the school year, books, notebooks, pens and other stationery supplies.  Now she wants to add a small eatery to her business.  She doesn't need much, because she already started buying some of the things she needs, such as plates, spoons and other items.  She is still a member in her communal bank, and this is their 8th loan cycle with MFP, where she feels very pleased to be able to develop her businesses with the support of all of you.  In addition, she promises to deliver all of her payments in a punctual manner, because she has always been a hardworking and honest person.  Once she receives your support, Angelica will invest the money in the purchase of food products for her store.

loans.use: to buy food products to stock her store

loans.name: Maria Irma

texts.es:
Maria tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 1 hija de 28 años de edad, vive en Choloma, Cortes.
Maria Irma tiene una actividad de negocio que es la elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz. Inicio este negocio impulsado por la falta de trabajo y que  no contaba con los recursos para solventar las necesidades del hogar.  Lo Estableció hace 1 año y vende sus tortillas desde su casa, ya que cuenta con los clientes fijos que llegan a comprarle. Ella atiende a sus clientes en la venta de tortillas todos los días 6 horas diarias.
Es su primer préstamo que solita a ODEF de 6000 lempiras para comprar los productos que necesita para la elaboración de sus tortillas (harina de maíz), eso le ayudara para seguir dándoles el servicio a los clientes y también para adquirir mas ingresos.
Su meta es crecer más en el negocio y poder vender  otros productos  que tengan demanda.
texts.en:
María is 58 years old and a single mother of a 28 year old daughter; she lives in Choloma, Cortes.

María Irma’s business is making and selling corn tortillas.  She started the business because of the lack of employment opportunities and because she lacked resources to cover household needs.  She started it a year ago and sells the tortillas from home since she has regular customers that always buy from her.  She tends to her customers in the tortilla shop every day for six hour daily.

This is the first loan she’s requested from ODEF.  It’s for 6000 lempiras to buy products needed to make tortillas (corn flour).  This will help her continue to provide customer service as well as to earn more income.  Her goal is to grow more in her business and to be able to sell other products that are in demand.

loans.use: to buy corn flour to make tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, de 42 años es un hombre trabajador y responsable. Vive solo en la localidad de Matahuasi, pero su vida gira entorno de sus 2 hijos: Jonatán y Cristian  a quienes educa. Desde muy joven comenzó con el trabajo en construcción, su principal ingreso económico. Cuenta que siempre fue responsable, a los 12 años trabajó como marino en una embarcación donde desarrolló su habilidad de pescador, con el pasó de tiempo aprendió a ser perforista, y es que, Jorge aprendió a desarrollar mil oficios. El trabajo de perforista, es lo que más le gustó, cuenta que existen días en las que no tiene mucho trabajo en construcción, ahí aprovecha para poder realizar algunos trabajos a los vecinos, quienes conocen de su capacidad. Aparte de ello, realizó la mayoría de las casas de su localidad, también trabajos para el estado peruano, con licitaciones en las que tiene que invertir gran cantidad de dinero. “Mi modalidad es: a todo costo, es decir terminó la construcción de las viviendas negocios o centros recreativos, etc. Cuando, ya están listos, todavía cobro el total de dinero”. Ahora Desea recompensar todo el tiempo que perdió en la educación de sus hijos, pues siempre trabajó y no dejó tiempo para otras actividades muy importantes. Este es el primer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Jorge de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de puertas, ventanas y electricidad para poner en su casa.
texts.en:
Jorge, 42 years old, is a hardworking man and responsible. He lives alone in Matahuasi, but his life revolves about his two sons, Jonatán y Cristian, who are students. 

Since he was very young he has worked in construction, his main economic activity. He has always been responsible. When he was 12 years old he worked as a sailor on a boat where he developed his skill as a fisherman, and as time went buy he learned to be a driller, and so, Jorge learned how to do a thousand trades.

The work that he likes most is the work of drilling. There are days when there is not much construction work, and then he takes advantage of being able to help some neighbors who know of his abilities. Apart from that, he works on most of the houses in his neighborhood, also working for the Peruvian government, with bids in which he has to invest a great deal of money. “My method is: at all cost, that is to say, finish the construction of the housing businesses or recreational centers, etc. Then, when they are ready, the collected payment covers everything.”

Now he wants to compensate for all the time he lost while educating his children, as he was always working and didn’t have time for other very important activities. This is his first loan through MFP, and he feels happy, because with the money he can improve his business and therefore his quality of life. Also, he likes belonging to his association, because the members are united and hardworking people. 

Jorge, upon receiving your help, will invest the requested money in the purchase of doors, windows and electricity for his home.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows, and install electricity

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to stock more merchandise to continue her business.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
El señor José Luis es padre de familia y tiene tres hijos a quienes les quiere dar la seguridad y la comodidad en su casa.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para la elaboración de la loza de concreto que le esta haciendo falta, en un cuarto que será para sus hijos, y no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material que es cemento, varilla, arena, pagarle a la persona que le ayudara a realizar la mejora. 
Don José Luis es empleado de una maquiladora en el aria de electrónica y aparte en horario adicional a su trabajo se dedica a la reparación de aparatos eléctricos, para general mas ingreso a su familia. 
Desea que sus hijos tengan su propio espacio en la casa ya que tiene una niña y dos niños.
texts.en:
José Luis is the father of three children for whom he wants to provide security and comfort in their home.  He is requesting a loan for the concrete slabs he needs for a room for the three children, because he does not have enough money to buy material such as cement, rods, and sand, and to pay a worker to do the job.

José Luis works at an electronics company and he also repairs electric equipment to earn more income for the family.

He wants his children, a daughter and two sons, to have their own space in the house.

loans.use: To put concrete slabs in one of the rooms.

loans.name: Liz

texts.es:
Liz, de 40 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Leónidas, su esposo desde hace 22 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo cuidan de 3 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Jauja.  Desde joven su principal sueño, fue tener un restaurante, ahora se siente feliz, pues logró lo que tanto anheló. Todas las mañanas trabaja sin descanso en la preparación de los alimentos para los comensales que llegan desde 7 años, a consumir los ricos platos que solo Liz, cocina. Su especialidad son los alimentos caseros y balanceados con productos de calidad; que ella misma escoge en el mercado, “tienen que ser frescos”, comenta. Su trabajo se centra de lunes a viernes, pues los fines de semana, dedica todo su tiempo, a su esposo e hijos. Su esposo trabaja como asistente en la gobernación de su localidad, donde recibe un sueldo mensual. Ahora ella desea mejorar la infraestructura de su restaurante, para que sus clientes se sientan felices y sobre todo cómodos en el momento de la comida. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Liz de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de platos y productos de primera necesidad al por mayor, para la preparación de los platos de comida.
texts.en:
Liz, 40, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with Leónidas, her husband of 22 years.  They have four children but only care for three of them in their own house located in Jauja.  

Since she was young her main dream was to have a restaurant and now she feels happy because she reached what she so desired.  Every morning she works non-stop preparing food for her diners who start arriving at 7am to enjoy the delicious meals only Liz cooks.  Her specialty is home-cooked, balanced meals made with quality products that she herself picks out at the market.  “They have to be fresh,” she comments.  

Her work is concentrated Monday through Friday because she dedicates the entire weekend to her husband and children.  Her husband works as an assistant in city government earning a monthly salary.  Now, she wants to improve her restaurant’s infrastructure so that he customers will feel happy and above all comfortable while having their meals.

This is her fourth MFP loan and she feels happy because she has the necessary capital to improve her business and thus her quality of life.  Also, she likes belonging to her communal bank because the members are supportive, hardworking people.

If Liz were to receive your support, she will use the requested money to buy plates and basic staple items at wholesale to prepare her meals.

loans.use: to buy dishes and food preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria es madre de familia y tiene dos hijos que están estudiando uno en la preparatoria  y el otro en la universidad. Esta solicitando un préstamo para pagar las colegiaturas y comprarles algunos útiles escolares que le están haciendo falta. Por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para cubrir esta necesidad escolar que tiene y que sus hijos terminen el siclo escolar sin ningún problema. 
Doña Maria de dedica al cuidado y atención de su familia y su esposo el señor Jesús es quien trabaja en una compañía de trasporte como chofer de un camión de carga. 
Desean que sus hijos tengan un mejor futuro y una carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Maria is the mother of two children who are students: one in high school and the other in college.  She is requesting a loan to pay for tuition and to buy school materials they need.  She does not have the money for this now, but wants to make sure her sons can finish the school year without any problem.

Maria takes care of the family and her husband, Jesús, works for a transportation company as a cargo truck driver.

They want their children to have a better future and a professional career.

loans.use: To pay for education costs.

loans.name: Wilmer Alexi

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 33 años de edad, es casado hace 8 años y tiene 3 hijos de 3, 5 y 7 años de edad con los cuales vive en una Colonia de La Lopez, Choloma, Cortes.
Wilmer es un joven muy  trabajador.  Dándose la oportunidad de ejercer otro ingreso extra el tiene un negocio donde se dedica a enmarca cuadros, espejos y hace divisiones de metal.  El lleva ya  4 años haciendo esta actividad, obtuvo la experiencia con un familiar que se dedica a lo mismo y al ver que era fácil de hacer y que tenia buena demanda entonces se motivo a trabajar en el. Dice que sus productos los vende de manera ambulante en diferentes sitios de la ciudad y su crecimiento ha sido favorablemente. Con la ayuda de financiamientos otorgados por ODEF el ha podido incrementar su inventario de producto  y que por lo tanto ha tenido buenas ganancias. Dedica a su negocio desde las 6.00am hasta la 4.00pm 4 días a la semana.
Actualmente solicita el préstamo numero siete de 13,000 lempiras, el cual le ayudara a invertir en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de sus productos como (Vidrios para cuadros, Poster para los cuadros, metal para las divisiones, pegamento etc.) para poder seguir vendiendo.
Su meta es seguir creciendo y en un futuro poder comprarse un vehículo para desplazarse con mas seguridad a vender su producto.
texts.en:
Wilmer, age 33, has been married for eight years.  He has three children, ages 3, 5, and 7.  They live together in the La Lopez neighborhood of Coloma, Cortes.

Wilmer is a very hard-working young man.  Giving himself the opportunity to earn an extra income, he has a business where he frames pictures and mirrors.  He also makes metal dividers.  He has been doing this business activity for four years.  He got experience from a relative who does the same work.  He saw how easy it is to do and that there was a good demand.  This motivated him to do this type of work.

He says that he sells his products in an itinerant manner in different places in the city.  His growth has been good.  With help from the loans granted by ODEF he has been able to increase his inventory of products.  So far he has had good income.  He devotes himself to the business from 6:00 a.m until 4:00 p.m. four days a week.

He is now requesting his seventh loan for 13,000.  The loan will help him buy raw materials to make his products.  He will buy things like glass for the paintings, poster boards for the paintings, metal for the dividers, and glue, etc.  He will do this in order to be able to continue selling.

His goal is to continue growing.  In the future his goal is to be able to buy a vehicle to travel more safely to sell his product.

loans.use: to buy raw materials like glass for the paintings, poster boards for the paintings, metal for the dividers, and glue, etc.

loans.name: Isolina

texts.es: Isolina, de 48 años es una mujer independiente. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos: Talía y Melisa  a las que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Jauja. Enviudó hace 15 años desde entonces, trabajó sin descanso para mantener a sus hijos cómodos y sobre todo brindándoles el amor de una familia unida. Su principal actividad económica es la consultoría de productos de belleza de reconocidas marcas de belleza. Tiene a cargo a vendedoras, quienes ofrecen los productos en ventas horizontales. Ella es una líder, pues se encarga de motivarlas y gana un porcentaje de cada vendedora. Eso le gusta mucho pues, se caracteriza por ser una persona muy tolerante y empeñosa. Ya tiene 4 años dedicándose a esto y espera seguir consagrándose en el desarrollo de su línea profesional. Paralelo a ese trabajo, es encargada de proyectos educativos en los centros lejanos de su localidad, ahí realiza capacitaciones, talleres y demás medios de difusión, se enorgullece de poder apoyar a que su ciudad se desarrolle por medio de la educación. Este es el segundo crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Isolina de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos de belleza para su negocio, pues no tiene capital de trabajo para abastecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Isolina, 48, is an independent woman.  She lives in company of her two children, Talía and Melisa, who she cares for in her own house located in Jauja.

She was widowed fifteen years ago and since then has worked tirelessly to keep her children in comfort and above all providing the love of a united family.  Her main economic activity is being a beauty consultant with products from well-known brands of beauty products.  She has saleswomen on her team who move product in horizontal sales.  She is the group leader and is in charge of motivating them and she earns a percentage of each saleswoman’s sales.  She likes this very much because she’s a tolerant, dedicated person.  

She’s been in this line of work for four years already and hopes to continue establishing herself in the development of her professional line.  Alongside this work, she’s also in charge of educational projects in centers away from her location.  She does training, workshops and other advertising campaigns.  She is proud that her city can develop through education.

This is her second MFP loan and she feels happy because she has the necessary capital to improve her business and thus her quality of life.  She also enjoys belonging to her communal bank because its members are supportive, hardworking people.

If Isolina were to receive your support, she will use the money to buy beauty products for her business because she does not have working capital to stock her customers.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Segundo Damian

texts.es: Segundo de 45 años vive ( Quevedo ecuador )el empezó haciendo fletes en untrisiclo . con el tiempo decidió poner una vulcanizadora . lo hizo y le va muy bien .trabaja con mucho  esfuerzo y ganas todos los días . la dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia. A futuro el anhela tener un auto y que DIOS le de vida a su familia . con el préstamo comprara (motor para moto, herramientas).
texts.en: Segundo, 45, lives in Quevedo, Ecuador, where he has a motorcycle transport business and tire repairshop, which are doing very well.  He works hard to earn a living every day, and has difficulty with delinquency.  In the future he would like to have a car, and he prays to God for his family's well-being.  He will use the loan to buy an engine for his motorcycle and tools.

loans.use: To buy an engine for his vehicle and tools.

loans.name: Luz  Maria

texts.es: Luz  es  una persona  muy  trabajadora  que se esfuerza  día  con día  por  salir  adelante, ella  tiene un   despacho  jurídico  obteniendo de esta  manera ingresos  para  sacar  adelante  a su  familia, en  esta  ocasión  se acerco  con nosotros ya  que  con  comenta  que   requiere  realizar  la  ampliación de  un  cuarto en su  domicilio , ve  en crédito la posibilidad  de ofrecer a sus familiares una  mayor  comodidad ya que  tiene tres  pequeños  hijos a  los que  desea  brindarles  lo mejor  en  la  vida,agradece  el apoyo   brindado  para  la realización de su   proyecto y la  facilidad  de  pago  que  le hemos  proporcionado.
texts.en: Luz is a very hard worker who strives every day to get ahead.  She has a legal firm which provides an income for her family.  On this occasion she has come to us because she wants to expand one of the rooms in her house and she believes a loan will help make her family more comfortable.  She has three small children who she wants to provide the best lifestyle for; and she is grateful for the support which will help with her project, as well as the easy loan terms we have given her.

loans.use: To expand a room.

loans.name: Eliana Vanessa

texts.es: Eliana de  22 años vive ( pariso Guayaquil ) ella decidió entrar al negocio de venta de artículos de belleza porque su mama le enseño a ser comerciante y le gusta mucho. Entonces ella decidió vender y le va bien . trabaja todos los días con muchas ganas el horario lo establece ella. A futuro anhela tener una familia y tener un buen negocio. con el préstamo comprara ( productos de belleza, perfumes, cremas).
texts.en:
Eliana, 22, lives in Paraíso, Guayaquil.  She decided to go into the business of selling beauty products because her mother taught her to be a storekeeper and she likes it very much.  Then she decided to be a vendor and it is going well for her.  Every day, with great desire, she works the schedule she sets up.  In the future she wants to have a family and a good business.

With the loan she will buy beauty products, perfume, and creams.

loans.use: to buy beauty products, perfume, and creams.

loans.name: Ecederio

texts.es: Ecederio, de 60 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive desde hace 27 años, junto a Bertha su esposa. Ambos tienen 2 hijos a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Carlos. A su edad, es todo un empresario, ahorró dinero para poder abrir en sociedad con otras personas dos grupos musicales, que son reconocidos en la zona, de ahí obtiene una ganancia extra, pues constantemente tiene que publicitar a su grupo para que tengan presentaciones. Paralelo a ello, se dedica al negocio de alquiler de equipos de música y audio, como amplificadores, instrumentos de batería, guitarra, mezcladores de sonido, etc. Ya tiene 30 años dedicándose a esto. Además de ser un agente mobiliario, vende casa de terceras personas, quienes le pagan una comisión por cada venta, además de vender terrenos para construcción de casas a terceras personas. Su trabajo consiste en la compra de un lote a menor precio, para que lo revenda a un precio mayor, gracias a ello, pudo ahorrar una suma considerable de dinero. “No puedo mezclar mi capital de dinero, existe un capital para mi tienda de alquiler, otro para mi negocio mobiliario y otro para el grupo musical”, afirma. Por ello, siempre trabaja con presupuestos establecidos, que le ayuda a administrar bien su negocio. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Ecederio de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago de los afiches, publicidad en los periódicos y producción musical de sus agrupaciones musicales.
texts.en: Ecederio, who is sixty years old, is a hard-working man. He has lived with his wife, Bertha, for the past twenty-seven years. They both have two children that they take care of in their own home, which is located in the town of San Carlos. At his age, he is an entrepreneur who is saving money to be able to start two musical groups together with other people who are well-known in the area, so as to earn more income. He is constantly advertising his group’s appearances. At the same time, he rents musical and audio equipment, such as amplifiers, percussion instruments, guitars, and sound mixers, among others. He has been working this way for thirty years. He is also a real estate agent who sells houses for third parties, who pay him a commission for each sale, along with land for the construction of houses for third parties. His work involves purchasing a lot for a low price and then re-selling it for a higher price. Thanks to these efforts, he has been able to save a considerable amount of money. “I can’t mix my capital. I have capital for my equipment rental shop, another for my real estate business, and another for my musical group,” he says. As a result, he always works with established budgets, which help him to manage his business. This is his fourth loan with MFP [Microfinanzas Prisma]. He is happy because he has the capital he needs to improve his business and, as a result, his quality of life. Additionally, he likes belonging to his group because the members are hard-working and caring. After receiving his loan, Ecederio will invest the money he is requesting by paying for posters, newspaper advertisements, and musical production for his musical groups.

loans.use: to pay for advertising space in the newspaper and musical production for his band.

loans.name: Angel Polvio

texts.es: la Angel de 51 años vive ( Quevedo ecuador )el empezó haciendo fletes en un trisiclo . con el tiempo asociación lo hiso mototaxi . le va muy bien .trabaja con mucho  esfuerzo y ganas todos los días . la dificultad que tiene es la delincuencia. A futuro el anhela tener un auto y que DIOS le de vida a su familia . con el préstamo comprara (herramientas, llantas)
texts.en: Angel, 51, lives in Quevedo, Ecuador, where he began a tricycle transport business that later became a motorcycle taxi business that is doing very well.  He works hard every day to earn a living and has some difficulty with delinquency.  In the future he would like to have a car, and he prays to God for his family's well-being.  He plans to use the loan to buy tools and tires.

loans.use: To buy tools and tires.

loans.name: Ketty

texts.es: Ketty, de 27 años es una joven trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Wilmer, su esposo. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Dany y Jefri a los que cuida y aman mucho. Ellos construyeron su casa propia, en la localidad de Paltarumi, donde viven. Ella es una mujer fuerte, a diferencia de los demás es la primera mujer que trabaja en la construcción de carreteras. Se siente satisfecha, sobre todo porque obtiene un ingreso extra y puede ayudara a su esposo, quien es músico y  toca en diferentes eventos de la localidad. “Toco música típica”, afirma. Ya en sus tiempos libres, aprovecha para poder ayudar a su esposa en el cuidado de sus sembríos y de sus vacas, ovejas y vaquillonas. Pues saben que tiene clientes que siempre comprar sus productos, además de disfrutar su estadía en el campo. Comenta que gracias a su esfuerzo, ahora están a punto de adquirir los papeles de su casa, con lo que será suya legalmente, además de haber comprado varios terrenos agrícolas para poder sembrar. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “La rosa de paltarumi” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde se siente muy satisfecha de poder, desarrollar sus actividades con normalidad, pues tiene el apoyo de todos ustedes. Además promete cargar todas sus cuotas de manera puntual, ya que siempre fue una persona trabajadora y honrada. Ketty de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de papa y alverja.
texts.en:
Ketty, 27, is a hardworking young woman.  She lives with Wilmer, her husband.  They have two children: Dany and Jefri who they care for and love very much.  They built their own house in Paltarumi where they live.

She is a strong woman.  Unlike others, she’s the first one to work building highways.  She feels satisfied especially because she earns extra income and can help her husband who is a musician that plays at various local events.  “I play traditional music,” he affirms.  In his free time he’s able to help his wife care for her crops, cows, sheep and heifers because they know that they have customers always ready to buy their products.  Besides, he likes being in the countryside.

She comments that thanks to their effort they are about to acquire the papers on their house which will make it legally theirs and they’ve also been able to buy several parcels of farmland to plant on.

She belongs to the “La Rosa de Paltarumi” (The Rose of Paltarumi) communal bank and this is the sixth MFP loan.  She feels very satisfied for being able to develop her activities normally because she has support from all of you.  She also promises to make all her installment payments punctually since she’s always been a hardworking, honest person.
  
If Ketty were to receive your support, she will use the requested money to buy natural fertilizer to spread among her potato and pea crops.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Eugenio

texts.es:
Eugenio, de 40 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive desde hace 20 años junto a Erika, su esposa. Ambos tienen 3 hijos, pero solo vive con 2 de ellos: Maribel y Cristina a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Chacapampa. Todas las mañanas, desde muy temprano, salen a recorrer los hermosos campos que posee, pues tiene que alistar el cerco para que las docenas de ovejas, puedan alimentarse. Confiesa que gusta mucho de poder cuidarlas y mantenerlas muy fuertes, pues depende mucho de ello para que los compradores compren los ejemplares a buen precio. Asimismo posee 6 vacas las cuales todos los días le brindan la leche, con la que Erika, realiza queso. Gracias a su eficiencia, realiza 3 moldes grandes que comercializa a los vendedores de productos lácteos.  Se siente muy feliz de compartir los días, junto a su familia en el campo, por ello, siembra diversos productos alimenticios, entre ellos tenemos papa, trigo y cebada en terrenos de la comunidad, en cada cosecha los comerciantes llegan a su mismo terreno a negociar el precio de los frutos. Agradece mucho a la comunidad, pues gracias a ellos puede comprar animales de raza a menor precio, ya que tiene convenio con las instituciones de crianza. Este es el tercer crédito con MFP, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras.
Eugenio de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de animales de raza para mejorar su ganado.
texts.en:
Eugenio, 40, is a hardworking man.  He’s lived with Erika, his wife, for 20 years.  They have three children but only two of them live with them: Maribel and Cristina, who he cares for in his own home located in Chacapampa.

Every morning starting very early they go out to inspect the beautiful fields he owns because he has to set the fences so that the dozens of sheep can feed.  He confesses that he likes being able to care for them and raise them strong very much because that’s what determines if buyers will offer good prices when they buy the animals.  He also owns six cows that provide milk daily that Erika uses to make cheese.  Thanks to her efficiency she makes three large molds that she sells to merchants that sell dairy products.

He feels very happy to share his days with his family in the fields and this is why he plants a variety of foodstuffs, among which are mangoes, wheat and barley in communal fields.  At each harvest, merchants come to his parcel to negotiate crop prices.  He is very grateful to his community because thanks to them he’s able to buy pedigree animals at a lower price because it has agreements with breeders.

This is his third MFP loan and he feels happy because he has the necessary capital to improve his business and thus his quality of life.  He enjoys being part of his communal bank because the members are supportive, hardworking people.

If Eugenio were to receive your support, he will use the requested money to buy pedigree animals to improve his livestock.

loans.use: to buy more animals.

loans.name: Agustina

texts.es:
Agustina, de 37 años, es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos, a quienes quiere mucho y cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Colcabamba. El sembrío de papa, maíz y habas es su principal ingreso económico. Todos los días desde las primeras horas de la mañana se dirige a sus terrenos de cultivo para alinear los surcos, fertilizar y poder prevenir el ingreso de plagas, “siempre tengo que estar pendiente de los problemas que pueden venir”, afirma. Por ello pasa el mayor tiempo entre sus sembríos, “allá en la altura”, como ella dice. Además como buena hija del campo, también cría animales, los cuales mantiene muy nutridos, con pastos naturales y sobre todo con el cuidado que solo, Agustina brinda. Por ello cuando están maduros los comercializa, a buen precio; a los comerciantes que llegan a su zona constantemente. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Maraypampa”, este es el primer crédito con MFP, y se siente feliz, pues encontró la ayuda que tanto necesitaba, para emprender sus objetivos. Además es responsable en todas sus labores, por ello promete ser puntual en los pagos.
Agustina de recibir su apoyo, aprovechará la temporada de demanda de maíz, para poder obtener ganancias. Esto lo realizará con la compra de fertilizantes para esparcir entre sus cultivos, que dentro de poco cosechará.
texts.en:
Agustina, 37, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with her two children who she loves very much and cares for in her own house located in Colcabamba.  Her main source of income is farming potatoes, corn and lima beans.  

She heads out into her fields every day very early in the morning to straighten out the furrows, fertilize and to be able to prevent pest incursions.  “I always have to be vigilant of problems that might arise,” she affirms.  Because of this, she spends most of her time among her crops, “up there in the heights,” like she says.  Also, like a good daughter of the countryside, she also raises animals that she keeps very well fed with natural grasses and above all with the care that only Agustina can provide.  Because of this, when they are grown she sells them at a good price; merchants come by her zone constantly.

She belongs to the “Maraypampa” communal bank and this is the first MFP loan.  She feels happy because she found the help she so needed to start toward her objectives.  In addition, she’s very responsible with all her tasks so she promises to be punctual with her payments.

If Agustina were to receive your support, she will take advantage of the season of highest demand for corn to obtain profits.  She will do so buying fertilizer to spread among her crops which will be harvested soon.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizer.

loans.name: Enrique Camilo

texts.es: Enrique de 49 años vive ( suburbio Guayaquil ). El decidió este negocio ya que le parecía bonito . por falta de trabajo que el no tenia decidió entrar a la venta de artículos para el hogar. El trabaja todos los días con mucho esfuerzo y mucha ganas. solo sale a recorrer las calles y le v a bien . a futuro el anhela tener su profecion . con el préstamo comprara (articulos del hogar, cucharas, platos, cuchillos)
texts.en:
Enrique, 49, lives in Suburbio, Guayaquil.  He chose this business because it seemed nice to him.  Because he did not have a job, he decided to go into selling household items.  He works every day with great effort and desire.  He goes out only to travel the streets, and it is going well for him.  In the future he wants to have a profession.

With the loan he will buy household items, spoons, plates, and knives.

loans.use: to buy household items, spoons, plates, and knives.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary, a 49-year-old married married mother of five children aged 30, 19, 14, 10 and 8 years, owns a butchery, a business she started 18 years ago that earns her a monthly income of KES 10,000. Mary is requesting a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase a slaughterhouse; the resulting increased business profits will aid her in paying school fees for her children.

Her dream is to see her business grow and her children achieve a good education. This is her first loan.

loans.use: to purchase a slaughterhouse.

loans.name: En Marcha Group

texts.es: Adelina es miembro del Grupo Solidario En Marcha, tiene 60 años de edad, se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas y golosinas, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos y junto a su familia reside en Tocoa, Colon, es una persona responsable y trabajadora. Doña Adelina inició a ganarse la vida desde muy temprana edad con la venta de tortillas y golosinas, actividad con la que saco adelante a su familia, desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de tortillas y golosinas, trabaja desde hace 24 años en conjunto con una de sus nietas, se levanta a las 4:00 am hacer sus tortillas y los fines de semana elabora nacatamales, montucas, etc. Su ventaja es que tiene una buena clientela que empieza a llegar a comprar las tortillas desde muy temprano. El préstamo que doña Adelina esta solicitando  lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de maíz en gran cantidad y carne para elaborar nacatamales. Con el apoyo de este préstamo podrá seguir teniendo una fuente de ingresos para su familia. Una de las metas de doña Adelina es tener un negocio grande y poder generar empleo a otras personas. Tiene 3 ciclos de trabajar con los préstamos de FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas de manera puntual y los préstamos obtenidos le han ayudado a mejorar su condición de vida.
texts.en: Adelina is a member of the Solidario En Marcha Group [Caring in Progress]. She is sixty years old, and sells tortillas and sweets. She is a single mother, and lives with her four children in Tocoa, Colon. She is a responsible and hard-working person. Adelina began to work for a living, selling tortillas and sweets, when she was very young, which she has done to help her family get ahead. She’s been working this way for quite some time. She’s been working together with one of her granddaughters for the past twenty-four years, getting up at 4:00 AM to make her tortillas. On weekends she makes nacatamales and montucas [traditional Honduran tamales], among other things. Her advantage is that she has a good customer base. Her customers start arriving early in the morning to purchase her tortillas. Adelina is requesting this loan because she needs to purchase large quantities of corn and meat to prepare nacatamales. With the support of this loan, she will be able to continue to have a source of income for her family. One of Adelina’s goals is to have a big business and be able to provide employment to other people. She has worked through three loan cycles with FAMA and has been punctual with her payments. The loans she has received have helped her to improve the quality of her life.

loans.use: to purchase corn and meat.

loans.name: Claudia Janeth

texts.es: La señora Claudia es una persona responsable y trabajadora la  cual se  dedica a la venta de  productos  de belleza en  esta  ocasión se  acerco a  la institución ya  que  requiere  realizar  la compra  de  diversos  productos  de  belleza como perfumes y cosméticos esto  para   continuar   brindando  a sus  clientes  el excelente  servicio  que  la  caracteriza,  ve  en  crédito  la posibilidad  de  obtener  ingresos   los cuales  le  permitirán ofrecer  a  su  familia  una excelente  calidad  de   vida.
texts.en: Claudia is a responsible, hardworking person who sells beauty products.  On this occasion she approached the institution because she wants to buy various beauty products like perfume and cosmetics to continue providing the excellent customer service she’s known for.  She sees in the loan the possibility of earning income that will allow her to provide an excellent quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy perfume and cosmetics.

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es: Armando  es  una  persona  muy  responsable, el se  acerco a  la  institución  debido  a  que   requiere  apoyo para  la realización de  su  proyecto, ya  que  nos  comenta  que  se  le  presenta  una  oportunidad  para  realizar  la  compra  de  un refrigerador ,  agradece  el  apoyo  brindado para  la  realización  de  su  proyecto,  ya  que  gracias  a  esto  podrá  ir  acondicionando poco  a  poco  su   hogar.
texts.en: Armando is a very responsible person.  He approached the institution because he needs support to carry out a project.  He comments that the opportunity to buy a refrigerator has come up.  He is grateful for the support provided for his project because thanks to this he’ll be able to gradually furnish his home.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: La señora Mercedes ya es cliente distinguido de la institución, ya  que a  lo  largo de  sus créditos  se  ha caracterizado  por  tener  una  excelente  cultura  de  pagos , ella tiene  dos  taxis   los  cuales  le  permiten  obtener   ingresos  para  salir  adelante  junto  con su  familia, es  por  ello que en esta  ocasión requiere  de  nuestro  apoyo  para  adquirir  un nuevo taxi, ve  en el crédito  la  posibilidad   de   hacer  crecer  su  negocio,  permitiéndole  brindar a  su  familia una  excelente  estabilidad  económica por lo que  esta  muy  contenta  de  habernos encontrado.
texts.en: Mercedes is already a distinguished client of the institution since she’s had an excellent payment culture all along her loans.  She owns two taxis that make it possible for her to earn income to get ahead with her family and this is why she now needs our support on this occasion to buy a new taxi.  She sees in the loan the possibility of making her business grow allowing her to provide her family with excellent economic stability so she is very happy to have found us.

loans.use: to buy a taxi.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Abraham le esta haciendo falta la barda alrededor, pero no cuenta con el dinero necesario para comprar el material que es block, cemento, varilla, arena y pagarle e la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora. 
Don Abraham es empleado de una compañía como guardia de seguridad desde hace más de cuatro años, su esposo la señora Marcela trabaja en una tienda donde elaboran tortillas de maíz y así con estos dos ingresos podrán salir a delante y darles a sus dos hijos lo mejor y una buena educación.
Desean mejorar el patrimonio y la seguridad de la familia en la casa.
texts.en:
Abraham’s house lacks a perimeter wall around it but he does not have the necessary money to buy the building materials and supplies which are concrete blocks, cement, rebar and sand or to pay the person who will do the improvement.

Abraham has been employed as a security guard at a firm for more than four years.  His wife, Marcela, works at a store where they make corn tortillas.  With both incomes they will be able to get ahead and provide their two children with the best and with a good education.  They want to improve their asset and their family’s safety at home.

loans.use: to build a wall around his house.

loans.name: Mairash

texts.ru:
Майраш 63 года, вдова, заботится о внуке.  В 1980 году, на собственные сбережения в сумме 100 советских рублей, Майраш закупила скот, начав таким образом свой бизнес в животноводстве. 
Благодаря упорному труду Майраш, на сегодняшний день хозяйство с 4 коровами и 1 нетелью приносит около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Майраш обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 135,000 сом (KGS) на покупку скота. Доходы Майраш планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение поголовья.
texts.en:
Mairash is 63 years old, a widow, and takes care of her grandson.  In 1980 started her own business in animal husbandry by buying livestock with her savings of 100 Soviet rubles.

Thanks to Mairash's hard work, today she has a herd of four cows and one heifer that brings her a monthly income of about 10,000 som (KGS) from the sale of dairy products.  With the goal of further developing her business, Mairash applied to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 135,000 som (KGS) for purchasing livestock.  Mairash is planning to invest the income in further growing her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Rebeca Angelina

texts.es:
Rebeca tiene 29 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos de 14, 12 y 2 años de edad, y en la actualidad están estudiando, su esposo es empleado de una empres privada y vive en una colonia de La Lopez, Choloma, Cortes.
Rebeca tiene un negocio de venta de tortillas, logro establecer este negocio con el apoyo de su esposo quien le ayudo a iniciarlo después de haberse quedado sin empleo. Lleva dedicándose a esta actividad 3 años. Su venta la hace de manera estable donde llegan los clientes a comprarle, ha logrado salir adelante ayudándole con los gastos del hogar a su pareja y esta al cuidado de sus hijos dedicándoles tiempo a ellos. Vende en su negocio todo el día.
Actualmente solicita su primer préstamo con ODEF de 6,000 lempiras para comprar sacos de maseca para la elaboración de las tortillas y también en hacerle mejoras a la galera donde elabora las mismas porque se encuentra un poco deteriorada y no  tener dificultad para trabajar en tiempo de invierno como en el de verano.
Su meta en el futuro es poder construir su propia casa y poder seguir dándole a sus hijos el estudio.
texts.en:
Rebeca, 29, is married and has three children who are 14, 12 and 2 years old and attending school.  Her husband is employed by a private firm.  She lives in the La Lopez neighborhood in Choloma, Cortes.

Rebeca has a tortilla shop.  She managed to set up this business with support from her husband who helped her start it when she lost her job.  She’s been doing this for three years.  Her sales are steady; customers come by to purchase from her and she’s managed to get ahead helping her spouse cover household expenses while caring for their children and dedicating time to them.  She sells all day.

She is asking ODEF for a 6000 lempira loan to buy sacks of Maseca [brand of corn flour] to make tortillas and also to make improvements to the shed she works in which is a bit deteriorated so that she won’t have any problems working in winter or in summer.  Her goal for the future is to be able to build her own house and to be able to continue providing schooling for her children.

loans.use: to buy sacks of flour to make tortillas and to do improvements on the shed where she makes them.

loans.name: Luz Amelia

texts.es: Luz de 56 años vive ( duran ecuador) . ella entro a este negocio porque vio en un anuncio la venta de productos naturales . el hijo de ella le dio la idea y decidieron alquilar un local pequeño y desde ese entonces venden productos naturales. Trabaja todos los días con ganas y esfuerzo. Es casada y tiene hijos mayores de edad. A futuro anhela tener su negocio grande su dificultad es la inseguridad . con el préstamo comprara ( productos naturales ).
texts.en:
Luz, 56, lives in Durán, Ecuador.  She got into this business because she saw an announcement about selling natural products.  Her son gave her the idea and they decided to rent a small place.  Since then they have sold natural products.  She works every day with great desire and effort.  She is married and has grown children.  In the future she wants a big business.  Her problem is the insecurity.

With the loan she will buy natural products.

loans.use: to buy natural products.

loans.name: Desarrollo Group

texts.es: Ignacia Yemileth, es miembro del Grupo Solidario Desarrollo, es casada y tiene 4 hijas, su esposo se dedica a la construcción de viviendas, sus hijas son estudiantes, ella es una persona responsable, trabajadora y con muchos deseos de salir adelante, y reside en el municipio de Colon. Ignacia desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de golosinas y refrescos naturales, su horario de atención es de 9:00 am y culmina a las 3:30 pm. Una de sus ventajas es que tiene muchos clientes ya que les gusta el producto que ella les ofrece. El préstamo que Ignacia solicita lo necesita para invertirlo en la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de golosinas y refrescos naturales como ser: harina, manteca, plátanos, pollo, tamarindos, melón, entre otros. Con el apoyo de este préstamo Ignacia podrá surtir su negocio por lo que tendrá mayores ventas y sus condiciones de vida serán mejores. Sus metas es hacer crecer su negocio y sacar adelante a sus hijos. su mayor desafio es poder tener el negocio en su casa ya que no tiene un lugar estable para la venta de sus golosinas. Ignacia tiene tres ciclos de ser clienta de FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Ignacia Yemileth is a member of the “Desarrollo” (Development) communal bank.  She’s married and has four daughters.  Her husband works building houses.  Her daughters are students.  She is a responsible, hardworking woman who very much wants to get ahead; she lives in Colon.

For the last ten years Ignacia has been working selling snacks and natural beverages.  Her work schedule is 9am to 3:30pm.  One of her advantages is that she has many customers because they like the product she offers.

Ignacia needs the loan she’s requesting to buy raw materials to make her snacks and natural beverages like: flour, lard, bananas, chicken, tamarinds and melon, among others.  With support from this loan Ignacia will be able to stock her business so that sales will be greater and her living conditions will be better.  

Her goals are to make her business grow and to raise her children.  Her greatest challenge is being able to have her business at home because she doesn’t have a stable place to sell her snacks.  Ignacia has been a FAMA client for three cycles and she’s made all her installment payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, lard and tamarinds, among others.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty lives in Yei. She sells fish, and has been in business for one year. She is 30 years old, married, and has four children, all of whom are still in school. 

Betty heard about BRAC South Sudan from a credit officer. This is her first loan from BRAC. She has requested a loan of 500 SDG in order to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Victoriano

texts.es:
Victoriano  tiene 35 años de edad, esta casado, tiene 1 hijo de 14 años de edad y esta estudiando, vive en una colonia de la Lopez, Choloma Cortes.
La fuente de ingreso de Victoriano es un negocio de venta de verduras y frutas frescas. El inicio hace 8 años ofreciendo su producto fresco a los clientes como ser bananos, plátanos, papas, sandias, mangos, tomate, repollo, lechuga, etc, Sale a vender su producto de manera ambulante a los lugares aledaños a la ciudad y se transporta en su propio vehículo.  Dice que este negocio le ha resultado muy bien ya que los productos que vende tienen bastante demanda y por lo tanto siempre sus ingresos son a diario. Y vende de martes a domingo de 5.00 am hasta las 7.00 pm.
Es su tercer préstamo con ODEF de 10,000 lempiras el cual lo necesita para surtir más de frutas y verduras y otra parte para hacerle reparaciones al vehículo ya que es su herramienta de trabajo para seguir desplazándose como hasta ahora lo ha hecho.
Su meta en la vida es seguir trabajando para poder darle a su hija que termine sus estudios.
texts.en:
Victoriano, 35, is married and has a 14 year old child attending school.  He lives in a neighborhood in La Lopez in Choloma, Cortes.

Victoriano’s source of income is selling vegetables and fresh fruit.  He started it 8 years ago selling fresh products to customers like bananas, plantain, potatoes, watermelons, mangoes, tomatoes, cabbage, lettuce, etc.  He goes out selling in an ambulatory way to places adjacent to the city and he transports himself in his own vehicle.  He says that this business has turned out very well for him in that the products he sells are in high demand so he always earns daily income.  He sells Tuesday to Sunday from 5am until 7pm.

This is his third ODEF loan.  It’s for 10000 lempiras that he needs to stock up with more fruit and vegetables and also to repair his vehicle which is his work tool so that he can continue getting from place to place like he’s done to date.  His goal in life is to continue working so that his daughter can complete her schooling.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables and to repair his vehicle.

loans.name: Ani

texts.en: Ani is a 49-year-old retailer from Yerevan. She lives with her husband and one child. Ani and her husband started the business three years ago by renting a booth in a city market. Ani has applied for this loan to increase the clothing variety. This loan will help Ani to increase sales and gather more income, insuring economical sustainability for her family.

loans.use: to pay for clothing.

loans.name: Trabajando Con Fe Group

texts.es: Reina  Isabel es miembro del Grupo Solidario Trabajando con Fe, tiene 50 años de edad, es casada y es madre de dos hijos, junto con su esposo reside en Tocoa, Colon. Es una familia de muy escasos recursos pero muy trabajadora, honesta y con buenos principios. Doña Reina desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y también tiene una pequeña pulpería, con este negocio pudo sacar adelante a su familia. Ella trabaja en conjunto con su esposo, su horario de atención de venta de ropa es de viernes a domingo y los días de semana se dedican atender la pulpería, una de sus ventajas es que tiene buena clientela ya que su negocio esta bien surtido. Con el préstamo solicitado doña Reina comprará un fardo de ropa usada de acorde a la temporada y así podrá ofrecer a sus clientes variedad en estilos. Ella está segura que con el apoyo de este préstamo sus ventas aumentaran y por lo tanto sus ingresos también.  Uno de sus desafios es poder trabajar con su propio capital. Doña Reina tiene dos ciclos de trabajar con Fama y ha cancelado sus cuotas puntualmente.
texts.en:
Reina Isabel is a member of the “Trabajando con Fe” (Working with Faith) communal bank.  She’s 50 years old and the mother of two children.  She lives with her husband in Tocoa, Colon.  

This is a family of very few resources but very hardworking, honest and with good principles.  Reina has been selling used clothes for a long time and she also has a small grocery store.  She’s been able to raise her family with this business.  She works with her husband and her work schedule selling clothes is Friday to Sunday and weekdays she works tending to the grocery store.  One of her advantages is that she has a good clientele because her business is well-stocked.

Reina will use the requested loan to buy a bundle of used seasonal clothes to offer her customers a variety of styles.  She is sure that with support from this loan her sales will increase and as a result so will her income.  One of her challenges is to be able to work with her own capital.  Reina has been working with Fama for two cycles and has made her installment payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy a bundle of clothes.

loans.name: Maurice

texts.en:
Maurice is a 29-year-old man. He is married and has three children. He runs a retail shop business. He has been in the business for eight years now and earns a monthly income of fifteen thousand shillings.

This will be Maurice’s first loan with KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to buy more stock: crates of bread, a sack of sugar, and salt for sale.

With the profit that he will get, he wants to pay school fees and start a business for his wife. In the future, he wants to own a bigger shop and become self reliant.

loans.use: to buy more stock of crates of bread, a sack of sugar, and salt for sale.

loans.name: Nurdila

texts.ru: Нурдила 1960 года рождения, женат имеет 3 детей. Он занимается откормом скота. Жена помогает по уходу  за скотом. Сам Нурдила мясник, его приглашают на свадьбы где необходимо разрезать овец или коров. За это он получает определенную сумму. Его жена домохозяйка, она доит корову и и продает молоко и делает разные молочные продукты.На приобретенный кредит они хотят увеличить свой скот и откормив их продать за более высокую цену.
texts.en: Born in 1960, Nurdila is married and has three children.  He fattens and sells livestock.  His wife helps him take care of their livestock.  Nurdila himself is a butcher and he is called out to weddings where it's obligatory to butcher sheep or cows.  He receives a fixed sum for this.  His wife takes care of the house, milks the cows, sells the milk, and makes various dairy products.  They want to use the loan they receive to buy livestock, and once fattened, to sell them for a higher price.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Edy
